version_description:
New Features:
- View your additional FICO® Score versions most commonly used in mortgage, auto and bankcard lending
- View more of your recent Credit & Identity Reports 

Enhancements:
- Bug fixes

New Features:
- Now get posted transaction monitoring alerts  (sign up on desktop browser required)
- Customize transaction monitoring alert thresholds

Enhancements:
- Numerous bug fixes

Fixed errors while registering the device for push notifications
Fixed navigation issues while viewing credit reports

What’s new:
·         Existing subscribers can now purchase credit reports from within the app. Simply go to the “Reports” page and click “Buy a New Report”.
·         Minor bug fixes

We are pleased to introduce the all-new myFICO mobile app.  Here’s what’s new:
•  A clean, modern look to help you find the FICO® Scores and credit data you need
•  A new bottom navigation bar for easy access to FICO® Scores, alerts, credit reports, FICO® Score Simulator, and more
•  New iOS access to the FICO Score Simulator
•  Be sure to check out the Insights card on the Scores tab for a breakdown of the key categories of credit data affecting your FICO Scores!

Feedback is always welcome.  Please message us in the app from the More menu > Provide Feedback.  Thank you for using myFICO!

• Bug fixes and performance updates, including a fix for the notification badge not clearing from the app icon
• Note, Touch ID is available after setting up a PIN on log in, or via the More > Settings > Password & Security menu

• Improvements for iOS 11
• Bug fixes and stability enhancements

• Sign-up for a new product or subscription from within the app
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Ability to upgrade subscription
- Notifications badge when report update becomes available
- Bug fixes and stability enhancements

• New: Easily check the rates you could get for mortgage and auto loans based on your FICO® Score
• Enhanced FICO® Score help content
• FaceID improvements for iPhone X
• Bug fixes and stability enhancements

• Interactive Score History Graph in Alerts list and details
• Bug fixes and stability enhancements
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

- Fixes for an issue where users with iOS 11.3 are unable to sign up
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
